plot: Shattering his hand during a championship bout, prize-fighter Christian Connolly reluctantly befriends the young enthusiastic boxer Jamie Quinn. This fragile relationship will have life changing consequences for both fighters.
title: Glassjaw
plot_es: Shattering his hand during a championship bout, prize-fighter Christian Connolly reluctantly befriends the young enthusiastic boxer Jamie Quinn. This fragile relationship will have life changing consequences for both fighters.
plot_en: Shattering his hand during a championship bout, prize-fighter Christian Connolly reluctantly befriends the young enthusiastic boxer Jamie Quinn. This fragile relationship will have life changing consequences for both fighters.
